name: Mahesh Medam
about:
I am a curious individual, a patient listener and a developer by heart. I am all about tackling complex problems, creative thinking, optimistic nature, making best use of the opportunity. Last but not the least, I can build websites, APIs and also possess a certain expertise in machine learning, computer vision and natural language processing.

Check out my work below and if you feel we can have a great time building stuff, send me a message.

education.name: Indian Institute of Technology, Kharagpur
education.description: Dual Degree, Department of Aerospace Engineering

education.name: Scaler Academy
education.description: Algorithms and Data Structures, System Design, Operating Systems, ReactJS

internships.name: Instoried Research Labs Pvt. Ltd.
internships.description: Implemented ULMFiT on a custom dataset achieving 42.3 perplexity in language modelling and 93.3% accuracy in sentiment analysis. Conceptualized and devised a novel pipeline for creation of embeddings from any labelled text dataset and implemented it for emotions. Created a simple rule-based engine for emotional classification utilizing emotional embeddings to achieve an accuracy of 75.7%. Devised a custom method to improve variety and relevance of recommendations for alternative words in context and word level

internships.name: Pyramid SoftSol Pvt. Ltd.
internships.description: Worked with team on design, development and integration of real-time video analytic solution for tracking patient's medicine usage. Applied Transfer Learning on ImageNet pre-trained SSD model built on Inception network and mAP@0.5IoU of 90.7% was achieved. Developed a Healthcare AI virtual assistant which can book appointments, take blood pressure and diabetic readings leveraging RASA.ai. Solely designed the conversation flow diagram and added custom Actions by accessing database to generate personalized responses.

internships.name: ChemicalShoppe Pvt. Ltd.
internships.description: Led the team on design and development of the ecommerce platform and created custom scrapers for efficient cataloging of products. Revamped the Invoicing and Pricing mechanism after the GST change took place and also incorporated Feedback feature in CRM Portal.

competitions.name: Accenture Innovation Challege 2018 [Finalist]
competitions.description: Developed a chrome extension that analyzes upto 20 pages of customer reviews of smartphones on Flipkart and Amazon websites. Designed API endpoints for rendering scores and authorisation and deployed with JSON Web Token token-based authentication. Implemented an automated pipeline for reviews scraping utilizing Puppeteer; then generate factor-wise scores from pickled Naive Bayes.

competitions.name: Code.fun.do SHOWCASE 2017, Microsoft [Finalist]
competitions.description: Developed a Messenger chatbot to help commuters get information regarding trains like live status, confirmation status and route. Consumed LUIS.ai api for Named Entity Recognition and Intent Classification and scraped railwayapi.com for railway information. Designed and created the chatbot utilizing Bootstrap and AJAX for UI and PHP for backend to consume the response of LUIS.ai API.

testimonials.description: I had the good fortune of mentoring Mahesh during his internship at Instoried. The thing I liked most about him was the minimal supervision he needed to accomplish his tasks. That, accompanied by his ability to read, comprehend, and quickly implement research papers proved to be very beneficial during our initial R&D stage for understanding Deep Learning based NLP / NLU algorithms. Finally, he has the initial sparks of an entrepreneurial spirit which proves to be very useful, as I found him to be invested in the business / strategy aspect of our company as well. Wishing him unlimited luck for whatever endeavour he chooses to pursue.
Mahesh demonstrated excellent ML/AI capabilities in building chatbot framework and SSD models in minimal time. He will be a recommended for any ML projects and Job opportunities.
